code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import'./faqSection.css';import{jsx as _jsx,Fragment as _Fragment,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const FaqSection=_ref=>{let{faq,setFaqs}=_ref;const[activeIndex,setActiveIndex]=useState(null);const toggleVisibility=index=>{setActiveIndex(activeIndex===index?null:index);};const handleInputChange=(index,field,value)=>{const updatedFaq=faq.map((item,i)=>i===index?{...item,[field]:value}:item);setFaqs(updatedFaq);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"faq-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"section-title",children:"Editar FAQs"}),faq.map((item,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:`faq-item ${activeIndex===index?'active':''}`,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{onClick:()=>toggleVisibility(index),children:`Pergunta do Faq ${index+1}: ${item.pergunta}`}),activeIndex===index&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:item.pergunta,onChange:e=>handleInputChange(index,'pergunta',e.target.value),className:"faq-input",placeholder:"Pergunta"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{value:item.resposta,onChange:e=>handleInputChange(index,'resposta',e.target.value),className:"faq-textarea",placeholder:"Resposta"})]})]},index)),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"button-group",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"save-button",children:"Salvar"})})]});};export default FaqSection;
